heartbeat_periodicity.description: 16.16-hour periodic brightness modulation (heartbeat-style lightcurve) reported for 3i/ATLAS.
heartbeat_periodicity.natural_interpretation: Rotating or tumbling nucleus and/or jet-modulated coma brightness; consistent with comet physics.

alternative_interpretations.summary: Loeb suggests the jets may be pulsed like a heartbeat and potentially tied to artificial thrusters; explicitly non-consensus and speculative.

validation_requirements: Locate and catalog the primary lightcurve paper (likely on arXiv/ADS; Santana-Ros group or equivalent).
Verify the period, amplitude, and data reduction method from the primary source.
Ensure heartbeat framing is clearly split: T2 fact (periodicity) vs T3/T4 interpretations (artificial/engine/heartbeat language).
